import React from 'react'; import './collection-item.component.styles.scss'; import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import addItem from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CollectionItem = ({id, name, price, imageUrl}) => (
{name} {price}
ADD TO CART
) export default CollectionItem;
